ygData.subject: Re: Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: I disagree.  Charming would become safer, but you d pay a price for it.  You would be burning through mana at a faster rate, ensuring you were OOM MUCH sooner
ygData.messageBody:
I disagree. Charming would become safer, but you'd pay a price for
it. You would be burning through mana at a faster rate, ensuring you
were OOM MUCH sooner (recharming every 10 seconds instead of 15).
It's also not fool proof, resists or early breaks would be a problem
because you'd have to get into command range to direct your pet. The
only way to really combat resists or early breaks would be to recharm
even sooner, which would further speed up mana burn.

Also, I believe all other forms of charm are refreshable AND Bard
charm is refreshable on PVP servers. Doesn't seem overpowering in
the least to me.

Darkfox
Xegony


> Charm would be WAYYYYY overpowered then. As is its extremly
powerful, with the only downside being the beating you take between
charms...
